g.text: Join us for an unforgettable night
of live music featuring top artists
Minimum 44px tap targets for all interactive elements
Bottom navigation bar for easy one-handed use
Font sizes optimized for mobile readability (min 12px)
Single column layouts, large input fields, clear labels
Slide-out navigation with large touch areas
Fixed "Book Now" button always visible on scroll
Modal dialogs slide from bottom for natural interaction
Clear active states, loading indicators, success animations
Swipe to dismiss, pull to refresh, pinch to zoom
iOS and Android design guidelines followed
Responsive images, lazy loading, WebP format
Color schemes adapted for system dark mode
